forceSubMenuRender.description: Render into the DOM before the submenu is displayed
forceSubMenuRender.description_zh: 在子菜单展示之前就渲染进 DOM

inlineCollapsed.description_zh: inline 时菜单是否收起状态

:inlineIndent.description_zh: inline 模式的菜单缩进宽度

mode.description: Menu types are now available in vertical, horizontal, and inline modes
mode.description_zh: 菜单类型，现在支持垂直、水平、和内嵌模式三种

v-model:openKeys.description: The currently expanded SubMenu menu item key array
v-model:openKeys.description_zh: 当前展开的 SubMenu 菜单项 key 数组

:overflowedIndicator.description: An icon to customize the omitted shrinkage of the Menu when there is not enough horizontal space
:overflowedIndicator.description_zh: 用于自定义 Menu 水平空间不足时的省略收缩的图标

v-model:selectedKeys.description: The currently selected menu item key array
v-model:selectedKeys.description_zh: 当前选中的菜单项 key 数组

:subMenuCloseDelay.description: The delay is turned off after the user leaves the submenu, in seconds
:subMenuCloseDelay.description_zh: 用户鼠标离开子菜单后关闭延时，单位：秒

:subMenuOpenDelay.description: After the user enters the submenu, the delay is enabled, unit: seconds
:subMenuOpenDelay.description_zh: 用户鼠标进入子菜单后开启延时，单位：秒

triggerSubMenuAction.description: Modify how the Menu submenu is triggered
triggerSubMenuAction.description_zh: 修改 Menu 子菜单的触发方式

events.name: click
events.description: Click MenuItem to call this function
events.description_zh: 点击 MenuItem 调用此函数

events.name: deselect
events.description: Called when unchecked, only for multiple
events.description_zh: 取消选中时调用，仅在 multiple 生效

MenuItemType.name: title
MenuItemType.description: 设置收缩时展示的悬浮标题

SubMenuType.name: popupClassName
SubMenuType.description: 子菜单样式，`mode="inline"` 时无效

SubMenuType.name: popupOffset
SubMenuType.description: 子菜单偏移量，`mode="inline"` 时无效
